com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.utils

Class TrackWalkingPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.utils.TrackMovingPoint
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.utils.TrackWalkingPoint

  • public class TrackWalkingPoint
extends TrackMovingPoint
    A Moving point implementation that allows one to 'walk' along rails without restricting to full-block movement, allowing for accurate distance calculations and accurate Minecart positioning information for spawning on rails.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The direction Vector to move from the current to the next

      The next position of the next rails
      double trackDistance
      The distance between the current and the next position

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public boolean move(double distance)
        Moves the distance specified, calling TrackMovingPoint.next() as often as is needed. Be sure to call a single TrackMovingPoint.next() prior to doing all movement in general. The currentPosition is updated.
        Parameters:
        distance - to move
        Returns:
        True if movement was successful, False if not

      • next

        public void next(boolean allowNext)
        Description copied from class: TrackMovingPoint
        Loads in the next track information. If no next information is available, this method throws an exception. Use TrackMovingPoint.hasNext() to check whether next track information is available.
        Overrides:
        next in class TrackMovingPoint
        Parameters:
        allowNext - - True to allow future next() calls, False to make this one the last
